about_the_game:
GAMEPLAY

"Bokube is a 3D push-block platformer with action and puzzle elements blended together. Every level introduces a new enemy, trap, or twist on the game's core mechanics to keep the gameplay fresh.

Change your camera's perspective! Rotate the camera around a level to understand how to solve puzzles or navigate Boku!

Each level has three yellow puzzle cube checkpoints for the player to find, push or pull, kill enemies, and take to their colored goals! The game will consistently throw new kinds of blue puzzle cubes at you, which act differently for deeper puzzle solving as you progress through the game.

FEATURES

45 fun levels!
9 bosses to defeat!
A cool soundtrack from various Japanese music artists, with a new song in every level.
Polished 3D audio design to make every level feel atmospheric and satisfy your ears.
6 zones of the game that play, look, and feel unique from each other, giving that adventurous video game feel.
Increasingly challenging difficulty without holding your hand. Only the game's controls are explained to you.
Beautiful full 3D graphics, with detailed textures, 3D particle effects, and a special "Bevel Cube" art style.
A gameplay mix of 3D platforming, puzzle solving, light combat, and grid-based Sokoban all in one!
Secrets that will keep you up at night!"

"Bokube is a 3D push-block platformer with action and puzzle elements blended together. Every level introduces a new enemy, trap, or twist on the game's core mechanics to keep the gameplay fresh.

Each level has three yellow puzzle cube checkpoints for the player to find, push or pull, kill enemies, and take to their colored goals! The game will consistently throw new kinds of blue puzzle cubes at you, which act differently for deeper puzzle solving as you progress through the game.

name: Bokube

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460 1GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Play as a bunny cube through tons of 3D levels filled with charm and challenging but fair gameplay!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Spain, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
